text.0: sing forth unto your varuṇa and mitra with a song inspired.
text.1: they mighty lords are lofty law.
text.2: full springs of fatness sovran kings mitra and varuṇa the twain.
text.4: so help ye us to riches great terrestrial and celestial wealth.
text.5: vast is your sway among the gods.
text.6: carefully tending law with law they have attained their vigorous might.
text.7: the two gods wax devoid of guile.
text.8: with rainy skies and streaming floods lords of the strength that bringeth gifts.
text.9: a lofty seat have they attained.
